  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x136

      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20

          text run at (0,0) width 286: "The table caption should be aligned at the left"

            text run at (26,0) width 72: "CAPTION"
